name: FBref
notes: No official public API. Requires scraping or a paid data provider.

name: Transfermarkt
notes: No official public API. Licensing required for redistribution.

name: FotMob
notes: No official API. Unofficial endpoints exist but are unsupported.

name: Spotrac
notes: No public API. Data access is licensed.

name: Capology
notes: No public API. Contact for licensing.

name: FMInside
notes: No public API. Web access only.

name: Scoretrend
notes: No public API documented.

name: American Soccer Analysis (Goals Added)
notes: Interactive tables only. No public API for g+ data.

name: American Soccer Analysis (MLS NP)
notes: Interactive tables only. No public API.

name: Statiskicks
notes: No public API listed.

name: WhoScored
notes: No public API. Data is licensed.

name: Opta (Stats Perform)
notes: Enterprise data feeds. Paid contract required.

name: RotoWire
notes: Paid API access. Key required.

name: XG (metric, not a source)
notes: Use a data provider (StatsBomb, Opta) or unofficial sources.

name: FIFA All Time
notes: No public API. Ratings are licensed data.

name: FC score
notes: No public API documented.

name: StatsBomb Open Data
notes: Free historical event data. Useful for xG and g+ prototypes.

name: Football-Data.org
notes: Free tier with API key. Fixtures, tables, results.

name: TheSportsDB
notes: Free test key and paid tiers. Teams, players, events.

name: API-Football
notes: Paid API. Player stats and fixtures.

name: Sportmonks
notes: Paid API. Player data, injuries, odds.
